newsitem.title: USA: Data Dimensions stake cut by Soros group.
newsitem.headline: Data Dimensions stake cut by Soros group.

text.p: A group led by international financier George Soros said Wednesday it has reduced its stake in Data Dimensions Inc to the equivalent of 4.92 percent, or 570,400 common shares.

In a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said it most recently sold a net 475,000 shares between May 15 and July 8 at $22.99 to $29.99. The group also bought and sold call options in the company between May 12 and June 17.
